channel.title: Specs on NoiseSocket
channel.description: Recent content in Specs on NoiseSocket

item.author: scratch@virgilsecurity.com (Alexey Ermishkin)
item.description: The NoiseSocket Protocol code{white-space: pre;} The NoiseSocket Protocol Author: Alexey Ermishkin Author: Trevor Perrin Revision: 1 Date: 2017-07-27 Table of Contents Abstract 1. Overview 2. Message Formats 2.1. Handshake messages 2.2. Transport messages 2.3. Encrypted payloads 3. Negotiation 4. Prologue 5. API 6. IPR 7. Acknowledgements 8. References Abstract NoiseSocket is an extension of the Noise Protocol Framework that enables quick and seamless secure connections with minimal code size, small keys, modern ciphers and hash functions, and extremely fast speed.
